node.statement: (Mutual absolute continuity by symmetry) The argument above shows T_psi* mu << mu. Replacing psi by -psi: define S(phi) = lim_{eps->0} d(T_{-psi}* mu_eps)/d(mu_eps)(phi). By the identical argument, S is a well-defined RN derivative giving T_{-psi}* mu << mu. But T_{-psi}* mu << mu is equivalent to mu << T_psi* mu (since T_{-psi} = T_psi^{-1}). Combining: T_psi* mu << mu and mu << T_psi* mu, hence T_psi* mu ~ mu. QED.
